title.en: A Prayer to Kyabje Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche

text.en: Master over the never-changing treasury of debate, exposition, and composition,
text.en-trans: gyurmé ché tsö tsompé ter la wang

text.en: With the qualities of love and wisdom and the three trainings perfectly complete,
text.en-trans: khyentsé labpa sum gyi yönten dzok

text.en: Precious source of unfathomable benefit and happiness—
text.en-trans: pakyé pendé jungné rinpoche

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: The guru’s kindness turned my mind toward the Dharma,
text.en-trans: lokha chö la chokpa lamé drin

text.en: The guru’s kindness caused me to take delight in Dharma,
text.en-trans: chö la gawa kyepa lamé drin

text.en: And if I haven’t abandoned the outward guise of a dharma practitioner—that too is the guru’s kindness.
text.en-trans: chö zuk mabor tsam di lamé drin

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: Having determined that the vital point for achieving enlightenment in a single lifetime
text.en-trans: tsé chik sangye drubpé lam gyi né

text.en: Isn’t ethics, nor joyous effort, nor wisdom,
text.en-trans: tsultrim mayin sherab tsöndrü min

text.en: But that awakening is won only through devotion to the guru—
text.en-trans: lamé mögü khonar takchö né

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: Through the auspicious connection of strong devotion to a realized guru,
text.en-trans: chö la jang tsön dul tsam ma jé kyang

text.en: It’s possible to experience the highest wisdom
text.en-trans: tokden lamar depé tendrel gyi

text.en: Without the slightest effort at practice.
text.en-trans: gongpa lha dang nyampé chewa yö

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: Persons considered evil and immoral, like butchers and prostitutes,
text.en-trans: dikchen shenpa metsong tsul chal sok

text.en: Are not suitable for salvation in the lesser vehicles.
text.en-trans: tekpa zhen gyi duljar majarpa

text.en: Yet, many such adepts have been liberated through the path of guru devotion.
text.en-trans: mögü lam gyi drolwé drubtob mang

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: The secret treasury of the ḍākinīs and the eight chariots of accomplishment
text.en-trans: khandrö sangdzö drubgyü shingta gyé

text.en: Are of a single voice in proclaiming reliance on guru yoga
text.en-trans: kün kyang zhal tün kün gyi sangwé né

text.en: As the secret and most crucial point of practice.
text.en-trans: lamé naljor khonar raklepé

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: You may spend your life behaving ethically and acting with restraint,
text.en-trans: mögü lam gyi tsawa ma tsuk na

text.en: But unless you’ve established the vital point of practice, the very root of the path, devotion to the guru,
text.en-trans: tsé gang dul trim tsangmé gyü dam kyang

text.en: You’ll remain no better than an ordinary person.
text.en-trans: semgyü tamal mi lé mi pakpé

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: You may be learned in the sūtras, tantras and various sciences,
text.en-trans: gyü sum lamé jinlab ma zhuk na

text.en: But, unless you’ve received the blessing of a guru who holds the three lineages,
text.en-trans: do ngak rikné kün la khé na yang

text.en: The realization of the ultimate meaning will not transfer to you.
text.en-trans: dön gyü tokpa po gyu mi dukpé

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: You may recite many billions of mantras,
text.en-trans: lama lha ru kho tak ma chö na

text.en: But, unless you realize the guru and deity to be inseparable,
text.en-trans: nyenpa dungchur drang mang dé na yang

text.en: You’ll not achieve the supreme accomplishment in this lifetime.
text.en-trans: chok gi ngödrub tsé dir mi tobpé

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: You may have been introduced to the genuine nature, the natural state of mind;
text.en-trans: depé drok dang yündu ma drok na

text.en: However, unless this recognition is supported by faith as a constant companion,
text.en-trans: semnyi nyukmé neluk ngotrö kyang

text.en: The power and expression of your experience and realization will lack direction and won’t increase.
text.en-trans: nyamtok tsalkha chokmé mi gyepé

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: You may offer prostrations, construct stūpas, and engage in many other virtuous deeds,
text.en-trans: lama sangye nyi du ma shé na

text.en: But, unless you know the guru to be Buddha in person,
text.en-trans: chakchö ten zheng gejor chi jé kyang

text.en: You won’t be able to capture the primordial stronghold in this lifetime.
text.en-trans: tsé chik dömé gyalsa mi zinpé

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: You may have been born in opulence and heard your praises resounding throughout the world,
text.en-trans: nyenpé sa khyab chegü tser sön kyang

text.en: But, unless you continually recall the guru’s kindness,
text.en-trans: lamé kadrin yangyang ma dren na

text.en: You’ll not progress on the path of the pure, divine Dharma.
text.en-trans: namdak lha chö lam du mi drowé

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: Unless you know how to revive yourself through faith,
text.en-trans: kyen ngen tok bab menpé sar lhung kyang

text.en: A sudden onset of negative circumstances could send you on errant ways,
text.en-trans: depé kham dü so tsul ma shé na

text.en: And there will be nothing to clear the pain, remorse and suffering.
text.en-trans: kyo dung yi ché sel khen mi dukpé

text.en: Supreme guide, Rabsal Dawa, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: dren chok rabsal dawar solwa deb

text.en: Now I’ll not deceive myself:
text.en-trans: daré rang gi rangnyi ma lü na

text.en: My guru, you who are the Buddha in person, hold me in your compassion!
text.en-trans: sangye ngö dré lamé tukjé zin

text.en: You are the focal point of my life, stronger and more majestic even than a mountain.
text.en-trans: sem kyi tesa ten ji ri lé ling

text.en: Care for me! Care for me! Rabsal Dawa, care for me!
text.en-trans: khyen no khyen no rabsal dawa khyen

text.en: As if in a blurry dream, I find myself continually waiting to behold your face.
text.en-trans: za zi milam nang né khyé zhal ré

text.en: Whatever befalls me, be it pleasant or otherwise,
text.en-trans: yangyang jalwar gukpé bu nga la

text.en: I have no other hope but you.
text.en-trans: kyiduk chi jung resa zhen mepé

text.en: Care for me! Care for me! Rabsal Dawa, care for me!
text.en-trans: khyen no khyen no rabsal dawa khyen

text.en: There are those who study extensively yet lack practice and accomplishment,
text.en-trans: töpa ché yang drubpé nyamtok tra

text.en: Or who display high realization but have no thorough training in Dharma.
text.en-trans: tokpa to yang chö la jangwa chung

text.en: Reflecting on this makes me remember you, my guru—
text.en-trans: dendra sam né khedrub nyiden pé

text.en: You who, like the six ornaments and two supreme ones, combine both learning and accomplishment.
text.en-trans: gyen druk chok nyi drawé lama dren

text.en: Some do not consider sentient beings or the teachings but pursue their own comfort.
text.en-trans: ten dror mi sem rangdön zhiwa nyer

text.en: Their minds are not yet matured but they claim to act with genuine altruism.
text.en-trans: ranggyü ma min zhendön drub lo jé

text.en: Reflecting on this makes me remember you, my guru—
text.en-trans: dendra sam né dön nyi lhündrub pé

text.en: You who, like the perfect Buddha, spontaneously fulfilled the dual purpose.
text.en-trans: dzokpé sangye drawé lama dren

text.en: Some see monastic discipline as supreme, and show little interest in mantra.
text.en-trans: dul trim chok zung ngak la möpa chung

text.en: Others enter the path of mantra and then allow all other vows to lapse.
text.en-trans: ngak la zhuk né dulwar güpa lhö

text.en: Reflecting on this makes me remember you, my guru—
text.en-trans: dendra sam né sumden dorjé dzin

text.en: You, a vajra-holder with the three vows, just like Pema Karpo.
text.en-trans: pema karpo drawé lama dren

text.en: For some, following a monastic life means giving up the lot of a lay person;
text.en-trans: rabjung jezung khyimpé chö kal ché

text.en: While remaining a lay person precludes becoming a disciple of the learned.
text.en-trans: khyimpa jezung khepé bulob mé

text.en: Reflecting on this makes me remember you, my guru—
text.en-trans: dendra sam né khor tsok nam zhi gön

text.en: You, protector of the four groups of disciples, benefactor of all, just like the moon.
text.en-trans: kün pen dawa drawé lama dren

text.en: Some know the long lineage ofkama, but lack the fortune to receive the short lineage of terma;
text.en-trans: kama shé kyang ter gyi chö kal mé

text.en: Whereas others hold many termas but do not possess the lineage of kama.
text.en-trans: terchö mang yang kamé gyüpa mé

text.en: Reflecting on this makes me remember you, my guru—
text.en-trans: dendra sam né kater kün dzompé

text.en: You who resemble a wish-fulfilling vase filled entirely with kama and terma teachings.
text.en-trans: dö jung bum zang drawé lama dren

text.en: Some consider their own way to be supreme, and belittle the ways of others;
text.en-trans: rang luk chok zung zhen gyi chö la mö

text.en: They parrot others’ ideas while casting the Dharma of the lineage aside.
text.en-trans: zhen luk jé jö gyüpé chö kal bor

text.en: Reflecting on this makes me remember you, my guru –
text.en-trans: dendra sam né tenpa yong kyi nyen

text.en: You who care for all teachings, like the sun of the world.
text.en-trans: dzamling nyima drawé lama dren

text.en: Fame and renown can entail a lack of experience and realization,
text.en-trans: nyendrak ché yang gyü la nyamtok mé

text.en: Whilst high realization doesn’t always mean recognition is forthcoming.
text.en-trans: tokpa to yang dzepé drak gya chung

text.en: Reflecting on this makes me remember you, my guru—
text.en-trans: dendra sam né kham sum wangdü pé

text.en: You, like a wheel-turning monarch, in control of the three worlds.
text.en-trans: khorlö gyur gyal drawé lama dren

text.en: There can be a fine Dharma practitioner who yet lacks worldly skill,
text.en-trans: chöpa zang yang jikten shé gya chung

text.en: Or a worldly person with great skill who yet has very little Dharma.
text.en-trans: jikten khé kyang chö kyi nyamlen tra

text.en: Reflecting on this makes me remember you, my guru—
text.en-trans: dendra sam né luk nyi kün dzompé

text.en: You, like a fine captain, well versed and skilled in both Dharma and the world.
text.en-trans: depön zangpo drawé lama dren

text.en: No matter the circumstance, I completely accept your guidance
text.en-trans: jinlab taktsen yö kyang mé kyang rung

text.en: And will act on whatever advice you have given me, my protector.
text.en-trans: ngödrub kalwa tob rung ma tob rung

text.en: Whether or not the signs of blessing are manifest,
text.en-trans: dünmé tsé gya gönpo khyé la té

text.en: And whether or not the fortune of accomplishment is won, I shall have no regret.
text.en-trans: lam né gangla khor yang gyöpamé

text.en: If I’m happy and my circumstances good, this is simply your blessing, my guru.
text.en-trans: kyi na lamé jinlab nyi du sam

text.en: When relaxed, I may sing a little song of realization and prayer.
text.en-trans: guyang nyamlu len zhin solwa deb

text.en: I pray to you, and dedicate everything to the benefit and happiness of all.
text.en-trans: pendé dro la ngo zhin solwa deb

text.en: Bless me, that I may develop genuine love and compassion.
text.en-trans: jam dang nyingjé kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: If I’m unhappy and in difficulty, I see this as accomplishment, as former misdeeds purified.
text.en-trans: duk na drib jong ngödrub nyi du shé

text.en: I pray to you, my guru: may I perfect my practice!
text.en-trans: nyamlen tsal jong jé zhin solwa deb

text.en: I pray to you: may I see the dissatisfactory nature of things.
text.en-trans: khorwé dukngal samzhin solwa deb

text.en: Bless me, that I may develop weariness with saṃsāra, and strong renunciation.
text.en-trans: kyoshé ngejung kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: All the practices of creation-phase yoga, deity meditation, mantra recitation and counting, and the rest—
text.en-trans: kyepé lha gom depé ngak drang kün

text.en: They’re all to be found in the simple practice of guru devotion.
text.en-trans: lamé mögü soldeb khona ru

text.en: Herein lie all the crucial points of the four nails that secure the life-force of the practice.
text.en-trans: sok dom zer zhi né gak chik dril na

text.en: Bless me, that I may see whatever appears as divine.
text.en-trans: gang nang lha ru charwar jingyi lob

text.en: The subtle essence,haṃ, is none other than the great bliss of my guru’s heart.
text.en-trans: dangmé hang yik dechen lamé tuk

text.en: Moved by thetummoof devotion and compassionately flowing,
text.en-trans: mögü tummö kulwé tukjé lé

text.en: It befriends the ḍākinīs of the sacred places and simultaneously brings forth the experience of bliss and emptiness conjoined.
text.en-trans: neyul khandrö drok dang lhenchik tu

text.en: Bless me, that I may perfect the practice.
text.en-trans: detong nyam tsal dzokpar jingyi lob

text.en: I may understand the words but fail to realize the meaning;
text.en-trans: tsik la tenpé gowé dön mi tok

text.en: Through effort-based meditation I remain bound, can’t realize the bhūmis.
text.en-trans: tsolwé chingwé gompé sa mi chö

text.en: Bless me, that I may do without contrived elaborations,
text.en-trans: zochö trö dang pang lang mi göpar

text.en: Able to meditate continuously, without acceptance or rejection, day and night.
text.en-trans: nyintsen gom dang drepar jingyi lob

text.en: Henceforth, whenever I think of your smiling face, my protector,
text.en-trans: deng né gön khyö gyé zhal nam jal tsé

text.en: I will think back to the life stories of the realized masters.
text.en-trans: ngön jön drubtob gongmé namtar zhin

text.en: May I never behold you as an ordinary person—
text.en-trans: tamal mi yi nangwa mi charwar

text.en: Bless me, that I may see you as the supreme deity.
text.en-trans: lhakpé lha ru tongwar jingyi lob

text.en: Essentially, from now on and in all lives to come,
text.en-trans: dorna di né kyewé trengwa ru

text.en: May I follow and please you, my protector;
text.en-trans: gönpo khyé kyi gyé zhin jezung né

text.en: May there be no obstacles in my Dharma or in life;
text.en-trans: tsé dang chö la barché mi jungwar

text.en: Bless me, that my mind may merge indivisibly with your wisdom.
text.en-trans: tuk yi yermé drepar jingyi lob
